Most Illustrious Sir

Certain of the government’s proven patriotism and distinguished adherence to the cause in which the brave people of Rio Grande are engaged, it entrusts you with the agency of the monthly subscription decreed on the 10th of last November, as in the authentic board, for the urgencies of the present struggle for our independence; and counts on Your Excellency

To remit the proceeds of the said subscription to the Inspector of the National Treasury in this city. God keep Your Excellency

Secretary of the State of the Interior and Finance Affairs in Piratini, September 14, 1837.

Domingos José de Almeida.

Most Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, Boqueirão. From the Ministry of Interior and Finance. Received on September 28, 1837.
